categories: Category:Events of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: Assassination attempt on Falit and Thranz

During the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, an assassination attempt was made on Senators Thranz and Falit on the Republic capital of Coruscant. However, the Jedi Knight Ardun Kothe was able to rescue the Senators during the attempt, and the politicians escaped without harm.
